scripts.build:resume: rm -f public/resume.pdf src/models/resume.aux src/models/resume.log src/models/resume.out && cd src/models && pdflatex -interaction=nonstopmode resume.tex > /dev/null 2>&1; mv resume.pdf ../../public/ 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.deploy: mkdir -p public && npm run build:resume && wrangler deploy
